@context.description: The context for the policy. Must include "http://www.w3.org/ns/odrl.jsonld"

@type.description: The type of policy. Must be one of: "Set", "Offer", "Agreement"

uid.description: The unique identifier for the policy. Must be an IRI.

profile.description: The profile(s) this policy conforms to. IRIs identifying the ODRL Profile(s).

inheritFrom.description: The parent policy(ies) this policy inherits from. IRIs identifying the parent Policy(ies).

permission.description: The permissions in the policy. At least one of permission, prohibition, or obligation must be present.

prohibition.description: The prohibitions in the policy. At least one of permission, prohibition, or obligation must be present.

obligation.description: The obligations in the policy. At least one of permission, prohibition, or obligation must be present.
